text:
During publication import, links to other documents are not rewritten to lenya-document: form.

This can be circumvented by reverting the fix described in 

 https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=47621

As I understand it, the link converter is executed before the original session is committed, so the newly created session has an empty siteree.
creator: rainer.schoepf@gmx.net
andreas@apache.org
text: Fixed in r1052370 (2.0.X). Needs to be merged to 2.1.X.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
